content.en: lncRNA Cancer Biomarkers: Scientists have been investigating the role of certain molecules called lncRNAs in different types of cancer. They are using algorithms to analyze these molecules and determine their potential as biomarkers for diagnosis, prognosis, and guiding personalized treatments. The algorithms can predict clinical outcomes, evaluate the tumor immune microenvironment, and even guide immunotherapy in various types of cancer, including hepatocellular carcinoma, gastric cancer, colorectal cancer, pancreatic cancer, and breast cancer.
content.da: lncRNA Cancer Biomarkører: Forskere har undersøgt rollen af visse molekyler kaldet lncRNA'er i forskellige typer kræft. De bruger algoritmer til at analysere disse molekyler og bestemme deres potentiale som biomarkører for diagnose, prognose og vejledning af personlige behandlinger. Algoritmerne kan forudsige kliniske resultater, evaluere tumorets immunmikromiljø og endda vejlede immunterapi i forskellige typer kræft, herunder hepatocellulært karcinom, mavekræft, kolorektal kræft, bugspytkirtelkræft og brystkræft.
